name: Risu's Birthday Nutz
description:
Welcome to the nut zone

Risu must find her friend's special nuts! enjoy 6 + 1 platformer stages with some cool gimmicks and themed around Holo IDs! jump and spin your way to win!

Made in few days for Risu's birthday in 2022. Happy birthday, Ayunda Risu!!!

Disclaimer

Ayunda Risu is a Virtual Liver from Hololive Indonesia ©Cover Corp.
This fan game has no affiliation to the owner of said intellectual property.

Credits

  • Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5
  • Stage Music : altersky-skycraze
  • Everything Else : agarpac
  • Special Thanks : Risuners
    Thank you so much for directions, suggestions, and playtesting my game! it has been super helpful and I had so much fun making this with you guys!
